mapper.select: select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum, id, cardprefix,cardname,banktoname ,noti, CASE WHEN cardtype='01' THEN '贷记卡' WHEN cardtype='02' THEN '借记卡' WHEN cardtype='03' THEN '预付卡' WHEN cardtype='04' THEN '准货记卡' WHEN cardtype='05' THEN '其它' end cardtype ,cardnumlength,cardbankdeptcode,operator ,createtime,modifytime,noti,cardagentid,cardno from INSBAgentBankcard a, (select @rownum:=0) b where cardagentid = #{cardagentid}

update INSBAgentBankcard set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},noti = #{noti},cardprefix = #{cardprefix},cardname = #{cardname},banktoname = #{banktoname},cardtype = #{cardtype},cardnumlength = #{cardnumlength},cardbankdeptcode = #{cardbankdeptcode},cardagentid = #{cardagentid},cardno = #{cardno} where id = #{id}
update INSBAgentBankcard set isdefault = #{isdefault} where cardagentid = #{cardagentid}
update INSBAgentBankcard set isdefault = #{isdefault} where id = #{id}
select a.banktoname from insbagentbankcard a GROUP BY a.banktoname
select name from insbagent where id=#{cardagentid} and usersource='minizzb'
